attributes.action: halal meat resturants and take aways
attributes.additional_details:
Any resturant or takeaway should be made by law to clearly display that they are using halal meat. Some big chains including KFC are using it at certain outlets. It should be down to the consumer if he or she wants it.
Some type of logo should be displayed in a promenant location on the outside of the buisness to prevent embarrasment for people who do not wish to consume halal meat
